## Summary

One paragraph summary of what happened.

## Impact

What broke, who was affected, and how.

## Detection

How it was detected. What signals were missing or delayed.

## Timeline (UTC)

- 00:00 Detection:
- 00:00 Mitigation:
- 00:00 Resolution:

## Root Cause

Primary cause and contributing factors.

## Resolution

What changed to restore service or unblock users.

## Action Items

- [ ] Prevent recurrence:
- [ ] Improve detection:
- [ ] Reduce MTTR:

## Lessons Learned

What we should keep doing, stop doing, and start doing.
